job_details.degree_required: Bachelor/Master’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.

jd: From: Shilpi, Upstream Global Services shilpi@upstreamgs.com Reply to: shilpi@upstreamgs.com Hi, Please find the requirement below and let me know your interest.. POSITIONJava Solution ArchitectAustin, TX (Onsite)12+ months Responsibilities:Technical Strategy: Define and execute the technical strategy for Java, Angular, and Spring Boot-based applications, ensuring alignment with business goals and industry best practices.Solution Design: Architect and design scalable, secure, and high-performance full-stack applications using Java, Angular, and Spring Boot.Technical Leadership: Lead and mentor a team of developers and architects, providing guidance on best practices, design patterns, and coding standards.Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product management, UX/UI design, and DevOps, to ensure seamless integration and delivery of solutions.Code Reviews: Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality, performance, and security standards are met.Innovation: Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in Java, Angular, and Spring Boot, and drive innovation within the team.Qualifications:Education: Bachelor/Master’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.Experience:15+ years of experience in software development and architecture.Extensive experience with Java, Angular, and Spring Boot, AWS services.Proven track record of designing and delivering complex, high-performance applications.Technical Skills:Java: Strong proficiency in Java and related frameworks (e.g., Spring, Spring Boot).Angular: Expertise in Angular for building dynamic and responsive front-end applications.Microservices: Experience with microservices architecture , service orchestration and RESTful/GRPC API design.Database: Proficiency in SQL and NoSQL databases.DevOps: Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins).Security: Knowledge of secure coding practices and application security principles.Certifications: Relevant certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect, TOGAF are preferred.Soft Skills:Leadership: Strong leadership and team management skills.Communication: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to interact with various stakeholders.Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Thanks and regards,ShilpiUpstream Global Services
